endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available materials in the database.
Fetch detailed properties of a specific material identified by its ID.
Search for materials based on specific property criteria provided in the request body.
Obtain a list of property categories available for materials.
Access data on how different materials are typically used in various applications.
Retrieve documentation and support files for integrating the API with existing design software.
Upload a design project file to extract material requirements for optimization.
Receive material selection recommendations for enhancing project performance.
Explore environmental ratings associated with specific materials.
Download dataset exports for use in offline analysis or backup.
